action.action-desc: Ms. Tokuda (for herself and Mr. Case) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to expand eligibility for certain contracts, and for other purposes.

subsection.text: Section 8020 of title VIII of division A of the Department of Defense, Emergency Supplemental Appropriations to Address Hurricanes in the Gulf of Mexico, and Pandemic Influenza Act, 2006 (15 U.S.C. 637 note) is amended by striking with agencies of the Department of Defense and inserting with agencies and departments of the Federal Government.
Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act, in order to carry out the amendments made by subsection (a)â€”

paragraph.text: the Administrator of the Small Business Administration, in consultation with the Administrator for Federal Procurement Policy, shall promulgate regulations; and
the Federal Acquisition Regulatory Council established under section 1302(a) of title 41, United States Code, shall amend the Federal Acquisition Regulation.
